subdefinitions.definition: Any area of land or water used for aircraft operation, regardless of facilities.
subdefinitions.label_groups: law , Australia , Canada , term of art

subdefinitions.definition: An airfield used for managed aircraft operation, either military or civilian, having such facilities as are necessary for operation.
An airfield equipped with air traffic control facilities and hangars as well as accommodation for passengers and cargo ; an airport .

definitions.definition: A flying machine composed of aeroplanes ( “ airfoils, aerodynamic surfaces ” ) . An aeroplane ( “ airplane, aircraft ” ) , particularly one constructed by or according to the design of Samuel Pierpont Langley and Charles M. Manly .

secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A flying machine composed of aeroplanes ( “ airfoils, aerodynamic surfaces ” ) . An aeroplane ( “ airplane, aircraft ” ) , particularly one constructed by or according to the design of Samuel Pierpont Langley and Charles M. Manly .
